I wish he could become president again. I say Arnold Schwarzenegger, not kidding.

Read full topic
item.source: The Next President (20 options!) (please no racisim, spaming or flaming)

item.title: The Next President (20 options!) (please no racisim, spaming or flaming)
item.dc:creator: @Aukake Aukake
item.description:
@Aukake wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:15, topic:9782”][quote author=Aukake link=topic=14156.msg160639#msg160639 date=1155790068]
Actually there is a limit of 10 years.
[/quote]

wrong, its 2 terms, which is 8 years ;)[/quote]

Sorry to revive an old topic but I felt the need :P. Also I’m not being a snob. There is a limit of 2 terms or 10 years, whichever comes first.

Scenario: President dies after two years in office and next in command (VP) takes his place and serves out the remaining two years of the previous presidents term. Former VP is elected for two more terms in office as President and serves for 10 years total.

Wikipedia proof! http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Presidents_of_United_States#Term_of_office

Edit: Technically, both of our initial statements still stand true. So we’re both right!

Read full topic
